prompt: Can you recommend software for live call subtitles in the same language and a separate translation line?

hidden_queries: software for live call subtitles in same language and translation line conferencing live caption translation
real-time caption and translation software for video calls Zoom Teams Google Meet subtitles translation
metadata.generated_search_query: software for live call subtitles in same language and translation line conferencing live caption translation

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are solid options for live call subtitles (same language) plus a separate translated line — both built-in features and add-ons: Built-in/video conferencing platform features Zoom Live Translated Captions – Zoom can show real-time captions in the spoken language and translated subtitles in other languages during meetings/webinars when enabled in settings. Zoom
Microsoft Teams + Copilot / interpreter AI – Teams offers real-time transcription and is rolling out enhanced real-time AI interpretation/translation features. The Verge
AI-powered third-party tools (plug-in or stand-alone) Wordly – Real-time AI captions, translation, transcripts, and summaries for meetings/events. Wordly
Transync AI – Live meeting subtitles and translation overlays compatible with Zoom, Teams, Google Meet. 同言翻译

sources.title: EventCAT Online Meeting | Real-Time Translation and Subtitles for Zoom ...
sources.snippet: EventCAT makes real-time translation, subtitles, and voice translation easy for Zoom, Google Meet, and Teams. Supporting 43 languages, it's optimized for sales, meetings, webinars, and education. Start without installation.

citation_mappings.claim_text: EventCAT – Real-time translation + subtitles for Zoom/Meet/Teams calls; supports dozens of languages. EventCAT+1
Talo – AI translator that adds live translated captions into calls on mainstream platforms. Talo
Felo Subtitles – Real-time multilingual subtitle/transcription translation for Zoom/Teams/Meet. Felo Subtitles

sources.title: Live Subtitles – Bilingual Captions & Speech Translator
sources.snippet: Live Subtitles is an automatic real-time subtitle generator that converts any audio or video into text and live translation. The app instantly transcribes speech and displays bilingual subtitles, showing both the original language and the translated text at the same time. Subtitles appear as a floating overlay on top of any app — videos, calls, live streams, social media, podcasts, online ...

citation_mappings.claim_text: Overlay “floating” subtitle apps Live Subtitles (Windows/Microsoft Store) – Generates same-language transcription plus translated text as a floating overlay over calls or any media. Microsoft Store
Notes for choosing Built-ins (Zoom/Teams) rarely require extra installs but may need specific subscriptions. Zoom
Third-party tools often offer broader language support and translation quality, but may involve costs. Wordly

citation_mappings.claim_text: Overlay tools like Live Subtitles work system-wide but depend on your OS and may not integrate natively into the call UI. Microsoft Store

sources.title: AI Translation & Captions for Meetings and Events | Wordly
sources.snippet: Wordly provides real-time AI translation, captions, transcripts, and summaries for meetings and events, making them more accessible, inclusive, and engaging.

citation_mappings.claim_text: If your priority is real-time on-screen subtitles + translated line, check Wordly or Transync first — they’re built for that dual-track use case with minimal setup. Wordly+1
